title: Action Learning-Based Organizational Learning and Career Development Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational workflow processes
context.additional_context: A process where practitioners solve on-site problems using action learning while simultaneously engaging in organizational learning and personal career development

learning_goals: Learners can design real workplace problems as action learning projects and derive solutions through implementation.
Learners can enhance their self-reflective learning abilities through peer feedback.
Learners can apply collaborative strategies that promote organizational learning culture to practical settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
